data.text: @gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen @willemhuman @yasserogier @stefanbar  so we disabled cache validation on LIVE for diagnostics. It speeds up the system and reduces database calls but we suspect it might be the cause for the below problem. Lets run it for a couple of days and see if we get any more. @yasserogier please can you just run a check every 2nd day or so to see if we have more PeformedBy blanks. Then we can rule it out.
